verses.verse: נָ֣סוּ <WH5127> flee וְאֵין־ <WH369> no רֹדֵ֣ף <WH7291> when no man pursueth רָשָׁ֑ע <WH7563> The wicked וְ֝צַדִּיקִ֗ים <WH6662> but the righteous כִּכְפִ֥יר <WH3715> as a lion יִבְטָֽח׃ <WH982> are bold

בְּפֶ֣שַֽׁע <WH6588> For the transgression אֶ֭רֶץ <WH776> of a land רַבִּ֣ים <WH7227> many שָׂרֶ֑יהָ <WH8269> [are] the princes וּבְאָדָ֥ם <WH120> thereof but by a man מֵבִ֥ין <WH995> of understanding יֹ֝דֵ֗עַ <WH3045> [and] knowledge כֵּ֣ן <WH3651> the state יַאֲרִֽיךְ׃ <WH748> [thereof] shall be prolonged

גֶּ֣בֶר <WH1397> man רָ֭שׁ <WH7326> A poor וְעֹשֵׁ֣ק <WH6231> that oppresseth דַּלִּ֑ים <WH1800> the poor מָטָ֥ר <WH4306> rain סֹ֝חֵ֗ף <WH5502> [is like] a sweeping וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> leaves לָֽחֶם׃ <WH3899> which leaveth no food

עֹזְבֵ֣י <WH5800> They that forsake ת֭וֹרָה <WH8451> the law יְהַֽלְל֣וּ <WH1984> praise רָשָׁ֑ע <WH7563> the wicked וְשֹׁמְרֵ֥י <WH8104> but such as keep ת֝וֹרָ֗ה <WH8451> the law יִתְגָּ֥רוּ <WH1624> contend בָֽם׃ פ

אַנְשֵׁי־ <WH582> men רָ֭ע <WH7451> Evil לֹא־ <WH3808> not יָבִ֣ינוּ <WH995> understand מִשְׁפָּ֑ט <WH4941> not judgment וּמְבַקְשֵׁ֥י <WH1245> but they that seek יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3069> God יָבִ֥ינוּ <WH995> understand כֹֽל׃ <WH3605> all

טֽוֹב־ <WH2896> Better רָ֭שׁ <WH7326> [is] the poor הוֹלֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> that walketh בְּתֻמּ֑וֹ <WH8537> in his uprightness מֵעִקֵּ֥שׁ <WH6141> than [he that is] perverse דְּ֝רָכַ֗יִם <WH1870> [in his] ways וְה֣וּא <WH1931> he עָשִֽׁיר׃ <WH6223> though he [be] rich

נוֹצֵ֣ר <WH5341> Whoso keepeth תּ֭וֹרָה <WH8451> the law בֵּ֣ן <WH1121> son מֵבִ֑ין <WH995> [is] a wise וְרֹעֶה <WH7462> but he that is a companion זֽ֝וֹלְלִ֗ים <WH2151> of riotous יַכְלִ֥ים <WH3637> [men] shameth אָבִֽיו׃ <WH1> his father

מַרְבֶּ֣ה <WH7235> increaseth ה֭וֹנוֹ <WH1952> his substance בְּנֶ֣שֶׁךְ <WH5392> He that by usury [וּבְתַרְבִּית כ] (וְתַרְבִּ֑ית <WH8636> increase ק) לְחוֹנֵ֖ן <WH2603> it for him that will pity דַּלִּ֣ים <WH1800> the poor יִקְבְּצֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH6908> he shall gather

מֵסִ֣יר <WH5493> He that turneth away אָ֭זְנוֹ <WH241> his ear מִשְּׁמֹ֣עַ <WH8085> from hearing תּוֹרָ֑ה <WH8451> the law גַּֽם־ <WH1571> Even תְּ֝פִלָּת֗וֹ <WH8605> even his prayer תּוֹעֵבָֽה׃ <WH8441> [shall be] abomination

מַשְׁגֶּ֤ה <WH7686> to go astray יְשָׁרִ֨ים ׀ <WH3477> Whoso causeth the righteous בְּדֶ֥רֶךְ <WH1870> way רָ֗ע <WH7451> in an evil בִּשְׁחוּת֥וֹ <WH7816> himself into his own pit הֽוּא־ <WH1931> will himself יִפּ֑וֹל <WH5307> he shall fall וּ֝תְמִימִ֗ים <WH8549> but the upright יִנְחֲלוּ־ <WH5157> [things] in possession טֽוֹב׃ <WH2896> shall have good

חָכָ֣ם <WH2450> [is] wise בְּ֭עֵינָיו <WH5869> in his own conceit אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> man עָשִׁ֑יר <WH6223> The rich וְדַ֖ל <WH1800> but the poor מֵבִ֣ין <WH995> that hath understanding יַחְקְרֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH2713> searcheth him out

בַּעֲלֹ֣ץ <WH5970> [men] do rejoice צַ֭דִּיקִים <WH6662> When righteous רַבָּ֣ה <WH7227> [there is] great תִפְאָ֑רֶת <WH8597> glory וּבְק֥וּם <WH6965> rise רְ֝שָׁעִ֗ים <WH7563> but when the wicked יְחֻפַּ֥שׂ <WH2664> is hidden אָדָֽם׃ <WH120> a man

מְכַסֶּ֣ה <WH3680> He that covereth פְ֭שָׁעָיו <WH6588> his sins לֹ֣א <WH3808> will not יַצְלִ֑יחַ <WH6743> shall not prosper וּמוֹדֶ֖ה <WH3034> but whoso confesseth וְעֹזֵ֣ב <WH5800> and forsaketh יְרֻחָֽם׃ <WH7355> [them] shall have mercy

אַשְׁרֵ֣י <WH835> Happy אָ֭דָם <WH120> [is] the man מְפַחֵ֣ד <WH6342> that feareth תָּמִ֑יד <WH8548> alway וּמַקְשֶׁ֥ה <WH7185> but he that hardeneth לִ֝בּ֗וֹ <WH3820> his heart יִפּ֥וֹל <WH5307> shall fall בְּרָעָֽה׃ <WH7451> into mischief

אֲרִי־ <WH738> lion נֹ֭הֵם <WH5098> [As] a roaring וְדֹ֣ב <WH1677> bear שׁוֹקֵ֑ק <WH8264> and a ranging מֹשֵׁ֥ל <WH4910> ruler רָ֝שָׁ֗ע <WH7563> [so is] a wicked עַ֣ל <WH5921> over עַם־ <WH5971> people דָּֽל׃ <WH1800> over the poor

נָגִ֗יד <WH5057> The prince חֲסַ֣ר <WH2638> that wanteth תְּ֭בוּנוֹת <WH8394> understanding וְרַ֥ב <WH7227> [is] also a great מַעֲשַׁקּ֑וֹת <WH4642> oppressor [שֹׂנְאֵי כ] (שֹׂ֥נֵא <WH8130> enemy ק) בֶ֝֗צַע <WH1215> covetousness יַאֲרִ֥יךְ <WH748> shall prolong יָמִֽים׃ <WH3117> [his] days פ

אָ֭דָם <WH120> A man עָשֻׁ֣ק <WH6231> that doeth violence בְּדַם־ <WH1818> to the blood נָ֑פֶשׁ <WH5315> of [any] person עַד־ <WH5704> until בּ֥וֹר <WH953> to the pit יָ֝נ֗וּס <WH5127> shall flee אַל־ <WH408> no יִתְמְכוּ־ <WH8551> let no man stay בֽוֹ׃

הוֹלֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> Whoso walketh תָּ֭מִים <WH8549> uprightly יִוָּשֵׁ֑עַ <WH3467> shall be saved וְנֶעְקַ֥שׁ <WH6140> but [he that is] perverse דְּ֝רָכַ֗יִם <WH1870> [in his] ways יִפּ֥וֹל <WH5307> shall fall בְּאֶחָֽת׃ <WH259> at once

עֹבֵ֣ד <WH5647> He that tilleth אַ֭דְמָתוֹ <WH127> his land יִֽשְׂבַּֽע־ <WH7646> shall have plenty לָ֑חֶם <WH3899> of bread וּמְרַדֵּ֥ף <WH7291> but he that followeth רֵ֝קִ֗ים <WH7386> after vain יִֽשְׂבַּֽע־ <WH7646> plenty רִֽישׁ׃ <WH7389> [persons] shall have poverty enough

אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> man אֱ֭מוּנוֹת <WH530> A faithful רַב־ <WH7227> shall abound בְּרָכ֑וֹת <WH1293> with blessings וְאָ֥ץ <WH213> but he that maketh haste לְ֝הַעֲשִׁ֗יר <WH6238> to be rich לֹ֣א <WH3808> will not יִנָּקֶֽה׃ <WH5352> shall not be innocent

הַֽכֵּר־ <WH5234> To have respect פָּנִ֥ים <WH6440> of persons לֹא־ <WH3808> is not ט֑וֹב <WH2896> [is] not good וְעַל־ <WH5921> Because פַּת־ <WH6595> for for a piece לֶ֝֗חֶם <WH3899> of bread יִפְשַׁע־ <WH6586> will transgress גָּֽבֶר׃ <WH1397> [that] man

נִֽבֳהָ֥ל <WH926> that hasteth לַה֗וֹן <WH1952> to be rich אִ֭ישׁ <WH376> He רַ֣ע <WH7451> [hath] an evil עָ֑יִן <WH5869> eye וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> and does not יֵ֝דַע <WH3045> and considereth כִּי־ <WH3588> that חֶ֥סֶר <WH2639> not that poverty יְבֹאֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH935> shall come

מ֘וֹכִ֤יחַ <WH3198> He that rebuketh אָדָ֣ם <WH120> a man אַ֭חֲרַי <WH310> afterwards חֵ֣ן <WH2580> more favour יִמְצָ֑א <WH4672> shall find מִֽמַּחֲלִ֥יק <WH2505> than he that flattereth לָשֽׁוֹן׃ <WH3956> with the tongue

גּוֹזֵ֤ל ׀ <WH1497> Whoso robbeth אָ֘בִ֤יו <WH1> his father וְאִמּ֗וֹ <WH517> or his mother וְאֹמֵ֥ר <WH559> and saith אֵֽין־ <WH369> is not פָּ֑שַׁע <WH6588> [It is] no transgression חָבֵ֥ר <WH2270> the same [is] the companion ה֝֗וּא <WH1931> he לְאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> of a man מַשְׁחִֽית׃ <WH7843> destroys

רְחַב־ <WH7342> He that is of a proud נֶ֭פֶשׁ <WH5315> heart יְגָרֶ֣ה <WH1624> stirreth up מָד֑וֹן <WH4066> strife וּבוֹטֵ֖חַ <WH982> but he that putteth his trust עַל־ <WH5921> in יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> in the LORD יְדֻשָּֽׁן׃ <WH1878> shall be made fat

בּוֹטֵ֣חַ <WH982> He that trusteth בְּ֭לִבּוֹ <WH3820> in his own heart ה֣וּא <WH1931> he כְסִ֑יל <WH3684> is a fool וְהוֹלֵ֥ךְ <WH1980> but whoso walketh בְּ֝חָכְמָ֗ה <WH2451> wisely ה֣וּא <WH1931> he יִמָּלֵֽט׃ <WH4422> he shall be delivered

נוֹתֵ֣ן <WH5414> He that giveth לָ֭רָשׁ <WH7326> unto the poor אֵ֣ין <WH369> will never מַחְס֑וֹר <WH4270> shall not lack וּמַעְלִ֥ים <WH5956> but he that hideth עֵ֝ינָ֗יו <WH5869> his eyes רַב־ <WH7227> shall have many מְאֵרֽוֹת׃ <WH3994> a curse

בְּק֣וּם <WH6965> rise רְ֭שָׁעִים <WH7563> When the wicked יִסָּתֵ֣ר <WH5641> hide אָדָ֑ם <WH120> men וּ֝בְאָבְדָ֗ם <WH6> themselves but when they perish יִרְבּ֥וּ <WH7235> increase צַדִּיקִֽים׃ <WH6662> the righteous
